unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!**
normalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!**

unnormalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, 'cause the Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a Mumbai summer.
normalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! Buckle up, 'cause the Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a Mumbai summer.

unnormalised: First off, Tata Motors just unveiled the "Nayi Disha" SUV at the Auto Expo in Greater Noida. Expected price? Rumors are swirling around Rs. 12 Lakhs. Features include a panoramic sunroof and, get this, self-parking!
normalised: First off, Tata Motors just unveiled the "Nayi Disha" S U V at the Auto Expo in Greater Noida. Expected price? Rumors are swirling around rupee twelve lakh. Features include a panoramic sunroof and, get this, self-parking!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra is teasing us with glimpses of its upcoming Thar EV. Dr. Anand Mahindra himself tweeted a sneak peek, calling it "India's electric adventure."
normalised: Meanwhile, Mahindra is teasing us with glimpses of its upcoming Thar E V. Doctor Anand Mahindra himself tweeted a sneak peek, calling it "India's electric adventure."

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki is rumored to be launching a CNG variant of its popular Baleno hatchback by Diwali. Fuel efficiency could reach a whopping 35 km/kg.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki is rumored to be launching a C N G variant of its popular Baleno hatchback by Diwali. Fuel efficiency could reach a whopping thirty five kilometer per kilogram.
